author: Ben Lee
title: Jennifer Lawrence lined up for Darren Aronofsky's next untitled project - Movies
text: Jennifer Lawrence is in talks to join Darren Aronofsky's next movie.The Hunger Games star looks likely to collaborate with the Black Swan director on the independent project, according to Variety. Â© REX/David Dettmann Jennifer Lawrence on Hollywood's gender pay gap: 'Men are lucky people with dicks'Lawrence recently dropped out of Boyhood filmmaker Richard Linklater's comedy drama The Rosie Project.But she is starring alongside Chris Pratt in space romance Passengers, and will appear in The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 2, X-Men: Apocalypse and Joy.Aronofsky has worked on Requiem for a Dream, The Fountain and The Wrestler, among other movies.Watch Jennifer Lawrence in a trailer for Mockingjay - Part 2 below:
